protein.general_function: Involved in protein serine/threonine kinase activity
protein.specific_function: IGF-1 leads to the activation of AKT3, which may play a role in regulating cell survival. Capable of phosphorylating several known proteins. Truncated isoform 2/PKB gamma 1 without the second serine phosphorylation site could still be stimulated but to a lesser extent

reference.reference_text: Brodbeck D, Cron P, Hemmings BA: A human protein kinase Bgamma with regulatory phosphorylation sites in the activation loop and in the C-terminal hydrophobic domain. J Biol Chem. 1999 Apr 2;274(14):9133-6.
